alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 2:53PM PST until November 19 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Snohomish and King Counties, including Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect 4 to 7 inches at Stevens Pass, with higher amounts possible if a convergence zone develops over the pass Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
